document_data.name: Ulamyth Quantor
document_data.mainbody: '''Ulamyth Quantor''' served as the High Priest, or High Torturelord, of [[Loviatar]] within the [[Tower of Pain Exalted]] in [[Zhentil Keep]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities:
High Torturelord Quantor supervised 14 fellow priests of the Maiden of Pain. He preached to a congregation of 26 followers.

Following the destruction of most of Zhentil Keep in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Ulamyth moved Loviatar's church to the newly erected [[Palace of Sweet Pain]] located on the southern shore of the [[River Tesh]] in the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]].
